name: Ekirth's Tomb to Temple Of The Gate

events.flavourText: You give the lever a hard yank.

name: Ekirth's Tomb to Crypt Of Atrocities

events.flavourText: A moldy pile of bones lies here, overgrown with moss and fungus.

name: Plain Of Pillars to Caves Of Ilast

events.flavourText: The pillar feels warm beneath your hand...

name: Isle Of The Gate to Caves Of Ilast
Ruins Of Hail use black blood

events.flavourText: On a hunch, you uncork the bottle and pour the noxious liquid out at the base of the pillar.

The evil smelling stuff is absorbed between the cracks in the paving with haste that is almost unseemly.
You are left holding an empty bottle and wondering if you have achieved anything...

name: Caves Of Ilast to Isle Of The Gate
Caves Of Ilast to Plain Of Pillars
Ruins Of Hail to Castle Fangorn

events.flavourText: The pillar feels warm beneath your hand...

name: Caves Of Ilast miriam chest contents

events.flavourText:
The chest is filled with trinket and junk - bent needles, old gnawed bones, bunches of twigs, discarded shoes and so on.

You find only one thing remotely interesting.

name: Castle Fangorn to Ruins Of Hail

events.flavourText: The pillar feels warm beneath your hand...

name: Gatehouse first wall button pre toggle

events.flavourText: Searching the wall, one of the stones shifts inwards at your touch!

Rummaging in the bottom of the barrel you find a stash of hardtack, still neatly wrapped cloth and stamped "HAIL SUPPLY CO".

The biscuits are very stale but still edible.
A loud clanking and grinding fills the dungeon.
You step purposefully into the vivid portal...
You step purposefully into the vivid portal...
You step purposefully into the vivid portal...
You cup the mysterious seeds in your hand...

Warmth grows slowly in your closed palm, and the sounds of the bustling city behind you fade into silence... with a start you realise that time has frozen around you. You stare in surprise at the dust particles suspended in mid air before you...
... when suddenly, you feel the familiar wrenching pull of  planar travel!

name: Ekirth's Tomb to Isle Of The Gate

events.flavourText: You're not fast enough.
You pick a handful of berries off the bush.

name: Temple Of The Gate to Ekirth's Tomb
Crypt Of Atrocities to Ekirth's Tomb
Plain Of Pillars to Ruins Of Hail

events.flavourText: The pillar feels warm beneath your hand...

name: Writhing Mire to Ruins Of Hail

events.flavourText: The pillar feels warm beneath your hand...

With blinding speed you grab a wriggling eel and haul it out of the water!

The other eels scatter into the depths.
